checkHorseFitness

public boolean checkHorseFitness(Horse horse)
Checks the horse fitness. There are conditions participating in a competition: Participating in a competition of type SHOW_JUMPING: Only for horses above the age of one year with and Equestrian with a JUNIOR rank Participating in a competition of type CROSS_COUNTRY: opened for all horses Participating in a competition of type BARELL: Only for a horse with age of less than one year and Equestrian with a MASTER or EXPERT rank Participating in a competition of type TROT: Only for a horse that his trainer has a success rate above 300 points Participating in a competition of type GALLOP: Only for a horse that his trainer's rank is JUNIOR, BEGGINER or PUNK

Parameters:
horse -
Returns:
true if the Horse Fitness is OK otherwise returns false

addHorseToCompetition

public boolean addHorseToCompetition(HorseInCompetition hic)
Adds a Horse to Competition if and only if the Horse is Fitted to the Competition conditions. It also updates the winner filed.

Parameters:
hic -
Returns:
true if succeed otherwise returns false
